running ntopng on ubuntu 14.04

starting nprobe

sudo nprobe --zmq tcp://*:5556 -i none -n none -b 2 -3 9996 -G

starting ntopng

sudo ntopng -i tcp://127.0.0.1:5556 -e -F

Tags: linux, network, monitoring
